MCD had fairly modest growth prior to the covid assault. It seems they did very good selling food through the drive up window. The numbers are quite impressive. It might be that they got a lot of business that would have gone elsewhere. The numbers prove it, see last quarters financial report.https://corporate.mcdonalds.com/content/dam/gwscorp/assets/investors/financial-information/earnings-release/Q2-21%20Earnings%20Release.pdfHowever, reality is their growth was moderate before, and the PE reflects that. Also their debt went berserk. In the meantime, the price may get pushed up, maybe a lot. They have done remarkably well though their entire history. They survived and flourished through Covid.
